H0.text: Which South Korean city was the venue of the 2011 World Athletics Championships. Seoul

H1.text: Which South Korean city was the venue of the 2011 World Athletics Championships. Busan

H2.text: Which South Korean city was the venue of the 2011 World Athletics Championships. Incheon

H3.text: Which South Korean city was the venue of the 2011 World Athletics Championships. 大邱

A4.text: The 13th IAAF World Championships in Athletics (Korean: 제13회 세계육상선수권대회) was an international athletics competition that was held in Daegu, South Korea.

A5.text: The IAAF announced Daegu as the winning candidate at the IAAF Council Meeting in Mombasa on 27 March 2007.

A6.text: Website for the IAAF World Championships in Athletics – Daegu 2011
